revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=WZR-HP-G300NH |revision=2 |upc=747464118468 |asin=B0028ACYEK |est_release_date=08/2011 |fcc_date=04/26/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Cameo |type=wireless router |fcc_id=FDI-09101896-0 |ic_id=6102A-035 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7242;AR7242-AH1A, G12196.1C, 1025; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |fla1_num=2 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16C6-25C |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9283;AR9283-AL1A, N4B274.00B, 1108; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8316;AR8316-AK1E, D1H1788, 1108; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.03;PB93; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.39.4; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt,DD-WRT, LEDE Project, |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=XXXXXXXXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^[A-F0-9]{12}$ |oui=00:24:A5 |oui_eth=00:24:A5 }} '''AirStation HighPower N300 Gigabit Wireless Router''' :[http://www.buffalo-technology.com/products/wireless/wireless-n-nfiniti/wzr-hp-g300nh2-airstation-nfiniti-wireless-n-high-power-router/ Product page] (US)
"WZR-HP-G302HV2", "21514W302HV21A1 Rev: A0-2", "03000611122010A" :are silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. This device appears to be manufactured by Cameo.
The default SSID appears to be the wireless interface MAC address :(no delimiters, upper case hex digits). The device probably uses AR9287 for the WiFi chip.
[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/buffalo/wzr-hp-g300nh2 On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *Revision A1A0 and WZR-HP-G302H A1A0 (Japanese variant) :WZR-HP-G302H is Japanese market name for WZR-HP-G300NH2, :and seems to have slightly different WiFi chip, [[Atheros]] AR9283-AL1A. :"WZR-HP-G302HV2" and "21514W302HV21A2 Rev:A2" is silkscreened on the board. *Revision B0A0 (marketed as N300 HighPower Gigabit) [[Buffalo WZR-300HP|WZR-300HP]] :This board, marked "WZR-HP-G302HV2 Rev:A3", is nearly identical to :the other revisions, and the same image appears to flash successfully.
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.usbjtag.com/vbforum/showthread.php?t=8570 ''JTAG a Buffalo WZR-HP-G300NH2?'' on '''UsbJtag''' forums]
